 Was it easy to hack?=C2=A0 How is it as a ghost box?=C2=A0 I would like to=
 do this one, since everything still works great, and it has those two big =
speakers, I don't go anywhere to need portable, and I have these others if =
i did, how does yours sound for ghosts?=C2=A0 Where is the mute wire in it?=
=C2=A0 Is there a symbol for the mute?=C2=A0 And which board is it on, ther=
e seem to be a few boards in this one. Thanks, s

is one, mine is a NX CX 202 whatever that is, plus mine=

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Was it =
easy to hack?  How is it as a ghost box?  I would like to do this=
 one, since everything still works great, and it has those two big speakers=
, I don't go anywhere to need portable, and I have these others if i did, h=
ow does yours sound for ghosts?  Where is the mute wire in it?  I=
s there a symbol for the mute?  And which board is it on, there seem t=
o be a few boards in this one. Thanks, s<br>
</div>
